description: Request for the procurement of ozone water treatment equipment for use in sanitizing cabinets
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
================================

### [RFP Ozone Sanitizing Cabinets][1]

**Reference:** WS3767999935-Doc3801939479
**RFP Number:** WS3767999935
**Publication Date:** February 2, 2023
**Closing Date:** March 2, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

### Notice Type and Solicitation Details

This notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) to supply Ozone Sanitizing Cabinets. The contract is for a period of three (3) months, from March 1st to June 30th, 2023.

### Contracting Entities

- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entities

- **End User Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
- **Address:** 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is governed by various trade agreements, including:

- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Tender Status

As of amendment number 4, the tender has been cancelled.

### Regions of Delivery

The delivery regions for this contract are all provinces and territories across Canada, with the exception of the specified regions.

### Notice and Contact Information

For more information, visit the Discovery (Ariba) platform:

- Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15291804?extsite=MTUyOTE4MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==][2]

To learn more, please contact:

- **Name:** Kenny, Luke (SPAC/P
